code: import React from'react';import Hand from'./Hand';import Controls from'./Control';import BetForm from'./BetForm';import Balance from'./Balance';import{useDispatch,useSelector}from'react-redux';import{dealCards,hit,stand,resetGame}from'../actions/gameActions';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Game(){var dispatch=useDispatch();var game=useSelector(function(state){return state.game;});var handleDealClick=function handleDealClick(){dispatch(dealCards());};var handleHitClick=function handleHitClick(){dispatch(hit());};var handleStandClick=function handleStandClick(){dispatch(stand());};var handleResetClick=function handleResetClick(){dispatch(resetGame());};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Balance,{balance:game.balance}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(BetForm,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Hand,{cards:game.dealerHand,score:game.currentDealerScore,isDealer:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Hand,{cards:game.playerHand,score:game.currentPlayerScore,isDealer:false}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Controls,{gameStage:game.gameStage,handleDealClick:handleDealClick,handleHitClick:handleHitClick,handleStandClick:handleStandClick,handleResetClick:handleResetClick})]});}export default Game;
